name: Alienware AW3225QF 32" 4K QD-OLED
description: 32-inch curved 4K QD-OLED with 240Hz refresh rate. Features quantum dot enhancement, infinite contrast, and Alienware's signature design for the ultimate gaming experience.

reviews.review_text: QD-OLED is the best of both worlds. Incredible colors.
Alienware design is love or hate but display is perfect.
